body:
Comment 6: 
In runtime/syscall std packages we add comments like this for autogenerated files:

// mksyscall.pl syscall_linux.go syscall_linux_amd64.go
// MACHINE GENERATED BY THE COMMAND ABOVE; DO NOT EDIT

// Created by cgo -cdefs - DO NOT EDIT
// cgo -cdefs defs_linux.go defs1_linux.go

I am curious whether the format can be standartized, so that go command understands it
and automatically regenerates files. E.g. if comments in go file name contain before
package :
// AUTOGENERATED BY: cmd -flags input.txt
Then go tool can compare modification times of the file and input.txt and regenerate as
necessary.
